title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.25 - Qualifications of members in charge and assistants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.25 - Qualifications of members in charge and assistants

State Regulations

As set forth in General Municipal Law sections 189(10)
and 195-c, (a) no person shall
participate in the management of any game of chance unless such person is a
bona fide member of the licensed authorized organization; and
(b) no person shall participate in the
operation of any game of chance unless such person is a bona fide member of the
licensed authorized organization or its affiliate or auxiliary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.25

Amended

New

York State Register March 31, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 13, eff. 3/31/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
